    • advRound

      public static double advRound​(double num, int dec)
      Round a number to a certain amount of decimal places.
      Parameters:
      num - double, number to be rounded
      dec - int, amount of decimal places to round 'num' to
      Returns:
      double, 'num' rounded to 'dec' decimal places

    • velFromAngle

      @Contract("_, _ -> new") @NotNull public static @NotNull Vector2d velFromAngle​(double a, double v)
      Get Vector2d velocity form angle and total velocity.
      Parameters:
      a - double, angle in degrees
      v - double, velocity in m/s
      Returns:
      Vector2d, speed acting in x and y direction

    • adjustFlagPosition

      @Contract("_, _ -> new") @NotNull public static @NotNull Vector2d adjustFlagPosition​(@NotNull @NotNull Vector2d start, @NotNull @NotNull Vector2d flag)
      Method to adjust the flag position to the left to make a checker flag
      Parameters:
      start - Vector2d, starting position
      flag - Vector2d, flag position
      Returns:
      Vector2d, checker flag used to determine if ball is on left or right side of actual flag

    • checkGoalSlope

      public static boolean checkGoalSlope​(Vector2d goal_position, Function2d function, double mass, double g, double mu)
      Method to check if terrain at goal position is too steep for the ball to stop.
      Parameters:
      goal_position - Vector2d, position of the goal
      function - Function2d, height function of the terrain
      mass - double, mass of the ball
      g - double, gravitational constant
      mu - double, friction coefficient
      Returns:
      boolean, false if slope is too steep, otherwise true

    • calcG

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Vector2d calcG​(@NotNull @NotNull Function2d h, Vector2d p, double m, double g)
      Calculate gravitational force at specified position with specified physics environment
      Parameters:
      h - Function2d, height function of terrain
      p - Vector2d, position at which to calculate force
      m - double, mass of ball
      g - double, gravitational constant
      Returns:
      Vector2d, directional gravitational force

    • calcH

      @Contract("_, _, _, _ -> new") @NotNull public static @NotNull Vector2d calcH​(double mu, double m, double g, @NotNull @NotNull Vector2d v)
      Calculate force of friction at specified position with specified physics environment
      Parameters:
      mu - double, coeficient if friction
      m - double, mass of the ball
      g - double, gravitational constant
      v - Vector2d, directional velocity of the ball
      Returns:
      Vector2d, directional force of friction
